column5: Has it really been as funky as it appears on a forecast to a guy here in Cleveland?  If so, I hope summer arrives soon!
Were getting the same here  , Ont.CA.
Being a weather guy I can say quite easily, yes, our weather has been funky!
i have liked the cooler temps, seriously we need alot of rain.  not this 10 minutes rain shower but a couple days of good hard downpoors.  i bet the farmers are getting worried!  Cheers!
June kicked Butt..  July's been crappy, and completly unpredictable...but hey I s'pose thats just an added challenge to deal with when fishing
they were way off when they predicted record heat
Challenge is getting the boat in the water now.  I can't back down any further, I'm off the launch pad in most places now.
